name: SubstanceSourceMaterial.partDescription.partLocation
title: SubstanceSourceMaterial.partDescription.partLocation
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The detailed anatomic location when the part can be extracted from different anatomical locations of the organism. Multiple alternative locations may apply
